dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang / gso sbyong yod kyi shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la ni med do/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po
dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gis smras pa la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/ phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing / mngon par bstod par yang ma byas/ phyir zlog par yang ma byas par stan dag
las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/ /mtha' gcig tu 'khod
nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig bar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par
gsol nas/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi la yang mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dang / gso sbyong bca' bar gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi
gsung bar gnang ba rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad 'dug pa dang bya ba dang / gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis

dge slong rnams kyis dang phyin chad 'dug pa dang bya ba dang / gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis 'dug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / bya ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / gso
sbyong ji lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag khyed tshur shog /'dug pa ni rnal 'byor

te| lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i mthil yan chad klad pa'i skra man chad la pags pa la thug gi bar du ji ltar gnas pa dang / ji ltar byas pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/ lus 'di la

skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu

ma dang / gnye ma dang / pho ba dang / long ka dang / lgang pa dang / mtsher pa dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / mkhris pa dang / bad
kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / gcin dag kyang yod do snyam du so sor rtogs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/
dge slong dag spyod yul du zhugs pa na yang rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa dang / de dag glang po che 'khrul pa dang / rta 'khrul pa dang / rkang thang pa 'khrul pa dang lhan
cig phrad nas 'gyel ba dang / bub par gyur nas/ ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag mi mthong ngam/ ci zhes co 'dri bar byed pa dang / de dag rnal 'byor bsgom mo zhes zer ba'i skabs
de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyod yul du zhugs pas rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag sgo khang du rnal
'byor sgom par byed pa na yur nas/ ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag /ci khyod 'du bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das
la dge slong rnams kyi sa gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag khyams su sgom par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid
du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyams su rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag gnas khang du sgom par byed pa na/ bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas/
sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyang mi thob pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du rnal 'byor sgom
par mi bya'o/ /de dag dgon par dong ste/ sgom par byed pa na/ chom rkun pa rnams dang / g.yon can rnams dang / seng ge rnams dang / stag rnams dang / gung rnams dang / gzig rnams
kyis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / dgon par rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/ /de dag
grong dang nye bar lhags nas sgom par byed pa na/ ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag /ci khyed cag 'ga' shi ba dang ldan par ma gyur tam/ zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der yal ga dag gam/ seg dag gam/ re lde dag gis bskor bar bya'o/ /de dag gis phyogs de yal
ga dag gam/ seg dag gam/ re lde dag gis bskor ba dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag /ci 'di rgyal mo ga gon gyis ra ba'am/ la phug gi ra ba'am/ zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs
de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o/ /de dag gis phyogs
de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag gis bskor ba dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag/ ci 'dri ma du lung ga'i ra ba'am/ 'on te bal po se'u'i ra ba yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rnal
'byor bsgom pa'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na spong khang
brtsig par gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis spong khang brtsig par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis spong khang rnams ji lta bu yin par mi shes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la
dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spong khang ni gnyis te/ chung ngu dang / chen po'o/ /chung ngu ni gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang gtod pa'o/ /chen
po ni gnas khang bcu'am/ bcu gnyis kyi bar du srang gtod pa'o/ /dge slong dag gis gnas khang byas nas sbyang byed pa bzhin du sgo dod par mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba| sgo dod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag sgo glegs mi 'dzud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/ /dbye dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| lag zungs gdags par bya'o/ /yang mig sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o/ /gcad dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ gnam zer dang / 'khor gtan dang / phred gtan gzhug bar bya'o/ /mun nag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung gdod par bya'o/ /dma' bar btod pa na/ chom
rkun pa dang / g.yon can dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / gung rnams kyis bgrod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dma' bar gdod par mi bya'o/ /mthon por btod pa na snang ba mi
gsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthon por gdod par mi bya bar sum gnyis dor bar bya zhing / sum gnyis bor ba nas sum char gdod par bya'o/ /de dag gong gi sum
gnyis bor te/ 'og gi sum char 'don nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu sum cha bor bar gdod par bya'o/ /dge slong dag phyi yangs shing nang rub par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bu gdod par bya ste/ phyi rub la nang yangs par bya'o/ /khwa dang mchil ba dang / phu ron dag 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
skar khung dra ba can du bya'o/ /sbrang bu tre ma pu ka dang / tre la ta dag 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/ /rlung gis 'byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ phred gtan gzhug par bya'o/ /gcad dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan gzhug par bya'o/ /dbye dka' nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu skam kha byas te/ phred gtan dang / gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan dag gis ni gcad par bya'o/ /dbyug gu skam kha ni dbye bar bya'o/ /der stan dgos par
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa'i steg bu dag bya'o/ /'khrang par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khri'u bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis khri'u bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis khri'u ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba'i khri'u bya zhing / de thags
mas bla bar bya'o/ /de dag gi thags ma du yod mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thags ma ni lnga ste/ mun dza'i dang / sha na'i dang / gres ma'i dang / ras ma'i dang / sba phra
mo'i 'o/ /de dag 'khrang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o zhes
bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis stan nang tshangs can ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid du khru bzhi pa zheng du khru do yod pa nyis ltab tu byas te drub par bya'o/ /de'i
nang du shing bal gyis dgang bar bya'o/ /de dag gis shing bal du yod mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing bal dag ni lnga ste/ arka'i shing bal dang / ka sha'i
shing bal dang / er kha'i shing bal dang / spra ba'i shing bal dang / shal ma li'i shing bal yin no/ /gzhan yang lnga ste/ bal dang / sha na'i shing bal dang / ras bal dang / ras ma dang / lo
ma'i tshogs dag gis bkang ba dag yin no/ /shing bal thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'chugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo mdor skud pas bya rog rkang gi gzungs gdab
par bya'o/ /'khod pa na yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdos bu gdags par bya'o/ /ji ltar gdags mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skud
pas btags te rna ba la gdags par bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu gzugs par bya'o/ /dge slong dag dbyug gu smyu gu'i bcad 'phro lta bus
'dzugs pa na/ rma byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur bya'o/ /'on kyang snad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ma dag gis dkris nas
dal bus khad kyis khad kyis gzugs par bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pho long 'phang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis mun khung du 'phangs pa na/ de 'khyams
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thags gus btags te 'phang bar bya zhing / de nas yang phyir drang bar bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdun du mar
me gzhag par bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa gcig brkyang bar bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa ya gcig kyang
brkyang bar bya'o/ /'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ langs te bcag par bya'o/ /dge slong dag 'chag pa na 'thom nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phred thag la 'ju bar bya'o/ /lag pas chang rgyud byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbu bu bskon la skud pas btags pa la 'jus te/
bcag par bya'o/ /mchil lham dang bcas pa 'chag par byed pa na sgra byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchil lham gyis gcag par mi bya'o/ /rdul gyis rkang pa
gnyis ma rungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ par thang gding bar bya'o/ /snums par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas spong ba
pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba pas zhag gsum zhing gsum zhing rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o/ /dge slong spong ba pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas
pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de dag der mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o//
'jeg dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ them skas bya'o/ /lhung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o/ /de 'phrul nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o/ /'on kyang mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol tu spong khang chen po
bya'o/ /de dag sgo sprod dag tu byed pa na/ de dag phan tshun snang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo snol mar gdod par bya'o/ /sgo khang bya'o/ /phug kyang bya'o/ /de dag
de na yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo drung du snam bu'am/ ras dpyangs te nyal bar bya zhing / 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de dag de nas song zhing yang phyis
'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar
mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / spong ba
la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba pa'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o/ /
dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dag dang ldan pa ni/ ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang
gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs bas mi 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i
zhal ta byed pa/ chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni/ ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/ bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/ je dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming
'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi spong ba ba'i zhal ta byed par spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bshams pa byas nas/
gaN+Di brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo ba nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las
bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing
bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes
bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi
ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing / dge slong ming 'di
zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos shing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i
zhal ta bgyid de/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge slong dag ngas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong
spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas/ spong khang du chag chag gdab par bya'o/ /phyag dar bya'o/ /lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o/ /stan bsham par bya'o/ /bshang ba'i sa dang / gci ba'i sa
byi dor bya'o/ /chag chag gdab bar bya'o/ /phyag dar bya'o/ /lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o/ /lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya'o/ /bong rdog dang sa dang chu gzhag par bya'o/ /de dag re re'i
gan du song ste/ 'bod par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re re nas bod par mi bya bar gaN+DI brdung bar bya'o/ /de gaN+DI rgya cher brdungs ba dang / ji tsam na spyod yul
gyi grong mi rnams chom rkun pha ma 'ongs sam zhe sdangs nas/ de rnams go bgos te lhags nas/ 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag
ma lhags te/ 'di ltar spong ba la tron byed do/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rnam par 'tshe ba la tron mdzad kyi/ 'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge

slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gaN+DI rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar gaN+DI ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI dang / las kyi gaN+DI dang / shi ba'i gaN+DI dang / spong ba'i

gaN+DI dang / gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI'o/ /de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI ni rgyud gsum dang tog gsum pa'o/ /las kyi gaN+DI ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo/ /shi ba'i gaN+DI ni byi ba'o/ /spong ba'i gaN+DI ni 'khar gsil lo/ /

gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o/ /de dag dus gting la thug pa na ci bder byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gting la thug pa na ci bder mi bya bar dus shes par byas nas ci bder

byas te/ dge 'dun las tshal ma 'thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang khrus byas nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du khom pa dang / bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rkang lag gnyis bkrus nas/ grong
du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom par bya'o/ /de dag de kho na bzhin du ci bder byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de kho na bzhin du ci bder mi bya bar rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o//
de dag ha cang mang du 'don par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o/ /de dag ha cang nyung dur 'don par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha
cang nyung dur gdon par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar rin par gdon par bya'o/ /de dag yon bshad par mi byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par
bya'o zhes bkang stsal nas/ de dag gis sus yon bshad par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad par bya'o/ /de dag yon bshad pa ha cang

mang du byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi bya'o/ /de dag yon bshad pa ha cang nyung dur byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang nyung

dur mi bya ste/ 'di ltar yon bshad pa ran par bya'o/ /dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'du zhing / thams cad kyi mdun du 'gyes par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'gyes par bya zhing / thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o/ /gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na/ des phyogs dben par lde mig sbas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo
zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis phye la zhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na
'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o/ /bya ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa 'di ni bya ba zhes

bya'o/ /gso sbyong gang zhe na/ dge slong dag ngas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gang yin pa ste/ de khyed kyis deng phyin chad zla ba phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing
so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis sus gdon par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba

phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis/ zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge
slong dag de'i gnas khang du 'du bar byed pa na de dag der mi shong ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang du gdon
par mi bya'o/ /de dag khyams su 'don par byed pa na/ der yang mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis gang la blo mthun par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas thams cad grub

pa'am/ byas pa'am/ zin pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo mthun par bya'o/ /'di ltar blo mthun par bya ste/
gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas
te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi
gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa
nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed de/ de'i slad du
dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas ba 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso
sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di
la| dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge
'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa'am/ lags pa nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par
bgyis lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas/ de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par byas pa der/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la/ gso sbyong dang
dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi las bya'o/ /mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/bam po bcu gnyis
pa| sdom la/ ka pi na dang chos gos dang / /dgrol dang mtshams chung mtshams chen dang / /gnang dang bskyung bskyed dgrol ba dang / /gcad dang mi 'bral ma bcad dang / /grong dgon las dang

dgon pa yi/ /sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da kwa'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na/ rgyal po'i khab na sde

can ma'i phug na gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas dge 'dun dang mthun par 'dug go /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe/ gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par

gyur nas/ shas cher tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na la sdod cing 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na 'di snyam du sems te/ deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bco lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong ka pi na'i

gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro ba mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar

bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed

pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun

gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/ /rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin/ /gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa/ /de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur//
zhes bka' stsal pas/ bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i sems kyis yongs su
rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ sde can ma'i phug tu tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i mdun du bzhugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ka pi na khyod gcig pu
dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa na/ 'di snyam du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong ni bco lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong ka pi na'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi
gnas su 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong
nyams su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge
'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag
nyams su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/ /rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin/ /gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa/ /de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur/ /
zhes bka' stsal pas/ bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam du sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa ma byung ngam/ btsun pa byung ngo / /ka pi na khyod re zhig dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi
gnas su mi 'gro na/ gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi byed na/ gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed par 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun gyi bya
ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro na/ gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi byed na/
gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/ ka pi na de lta bas na/ khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro bar ma byed par song zhig /ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong nyams su mi myong bar
ma byed par nyams su myong bar byos shig /ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro bar mi byed par song zhig /ka pi na khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun
gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su mi myong bar ma byed par nyams su myong bar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na khrid nas/ gso sbyong gi
gnas ga la bar gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa rjes su gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar gcad par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/ shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan
ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/
khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i
mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//
de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham par byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la/ dge slong
gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan por shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan
ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/ /lho phyogs
dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs
kyi mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/ /de 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun
pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogs
su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/
bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge
'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu
ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge 'dun gyis grong dang / grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas
mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na
dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i
mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan
ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi
nang du/ gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye
'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig
pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug
pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i
slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste/ gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol
ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/ /mi mthun bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams chos gos gsum thogs te/ nyin mo spyod du 'dong ba na/ skyo bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom
ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag
dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/
dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun
mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge
'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang
'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun
mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par
gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/ gnas
bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba
stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge
slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang
du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa dang / dge slong rnams stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi
bya'o/ /dge slong dag la bzhi'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung zhing / lnga'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag dang / bcu'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung nas/ de dag dge 'dun thams cad sdud par
byed pa na/ dge slong rnams kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bya'o/ /'di ltar bcad par bya ste/ je dang por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya'o/ /'di ltar dgrol bar
bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/ dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge
slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams
chen po bcad pa/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad do/ /'di
ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams
chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni
cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/
dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing bkrol lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams
bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/ shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po
gzugs par bya'o/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs
par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham par byas nas/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/ dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par
gyur pa la/ dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/ shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur ba btab pa'am/ srad bu
bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab
pa'am/ srad bu bres pa'am/ rdo bzhag pa'am/ srol gtod la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun
btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i
mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa lags/ nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/ byang
phyogs su ni srol gtod pa brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di
rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams bu chung gcod cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par
mdzad do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa
rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/ lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa lags/ nub
phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni srol gtod pa brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang /
dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di
lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg bar gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di ltar gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong
rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de'i
'og tu mtshams chen po bcad par bya'o/ /'di ltar bcad par bya ste/ je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma
brtan po/ shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi
mtshan ma'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang pha
bong gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi

te| dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug

mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan
ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/
dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang /

gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogs su ni pha bong
gi mtshan ma'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogs su
ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po
lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge

du mtshams chen po gcod na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang /
dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i
bar du mtshams chen po bcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/
dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas
par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/ 'di
ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste/ gso sbyong bya zhing dgag
dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/ /mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu mtshams
chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa byas nas/ gaN+DI
brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur ba la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba
byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i
gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis
'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag
dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir
dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams
bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/ tshe
dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du| mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams
cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun
gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/ 'di
ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang
ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa las bgyis pa gcig gis gsol ba gcig dang / las brjod pa gcig gis mtshams kyi sgo nang dang slad rol dang bcas pa bskyung
ba dang / bskyed par rung ngam/ nye bar 'khor/ rung ste/ de la bskyung ba ni 'di yin te chung ngu'o/ /de la bskyed pa ni 'di yin te chen po'o/ /'di ltar bya ste/ je dang por mtshams
chen po dgrol bar bya zhing mtshams bu chung yang dgrol bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor ba gzhig par bya'o/ /'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams ba byas nas gaN+DI
brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/ mtshams gnyi
gar dge 'dun bkod de/ dge slong las byed pas mtshams gnyi gar shing ngam/ dbyug pa'am/ gseg gam/ re ldes mnan nas/ gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge
'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad cing / mtshams
bu chung bcad de dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bgyis pa/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun
