pa de yang shes pa dang / bu pho shes shing bu mo shes pa'o/ /gal te khye'ur 'gyur na dku g.yas par rten cing gnas so/ /gal te bu mor 'gyur na dku g.yon par rten cing gnas so/ /de yid
dga' zhing mgu nas khyim thab la smras pa/ rje'i sras dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ bdag la sems can zhugs pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing gnas pa las na gdon mi za
bar khye'ur 'gyur ro/ /de yang dga' zhing mgu bas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis yun ring mo zhig nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag dang
mthun par skye zhing / mi mthun par mi skye ba dang / bdag gi bya ba dag byed pa dang / gsos pas phyir bso ba dang / bgo skal la spyod pa dang / bdag gi rigs kyi brgyud yun ring du gnas par

bsgrub pa dang / bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa na/ nyung du'am/ mang por yang rung sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur
cig ces bdag cag gnyis kyi ming nas brjod cing yon bsngo ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de la sems can zhugs par shes nas gang yang mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ steng

gi khang bzang gi gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang / sman pas bcas pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang / ha cang mi skyur ba dang / ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang / ha cang mi mngar

ba dang / ha cang mi tsha ba dang / ha cang mi bska ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba rnams spangs pa'i zas dang / se mo do dang / do shal dag gis brgyan pa'i lus lha'i bu mo

dga' tshal na rnam par spyod pa bzhin du khri nas khri dang khri'u nas khri'ur rgyu zhing shod kyi sa gzhir mi 'bab pa ste/ sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi grag par byas so/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas
khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba mgo gdugs lta bu/ lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ rin po ches

spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la btags pa'i khye'u zhig btsas so/ /gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong na/ rin po che spyod ba ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes rin po che brtag pa'i
phyir bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rin po che rin thang chod cig /de dag gis smras pa/ rin po che'i rin thang gcad par mi nus so/ /chos nyid kyis rin
thang gcad par mi nus pa'i rin po che gang yin pa de ni bye ba ri ba yin pas de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag rin po che 'di bye ba ri'o/ /de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas/ nyi ma bdun
gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ ming 'dogs par byed de/ shes ldan dag khye'u yi ming cir gdags/ gnyen dag gis smras pa/ khye'u 'di rin po che bye ba

ri bas spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la btags shing / rgyu skar gro bzhin la btsas pas khye'u'i ming gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba rir gdags so zhes de'i ming gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba rir btags so/ /gang gi
nyi ma la gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri btsas pa de'i nyi ma la khyim bdag stobs kyi sde'i mngag gzhug pa'i khye'u gnyis btsas te/ des gcig gi ming ni bran zhes bya bar btags so/ /gcig gi

ming ni skyong ba zhes bya ba btags so/ /gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba rim ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / di ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /

rtse grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad kyis de 'o ma dang zho dang mar sar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/

skyed par byed de/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/ /de gang gi tshe chen por gyur ba de'i tshe yi ge dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / dbyung ba dang / gzhug pa dang /

gzhag pa dang / len pa dang / gzhi brtag pa dang / sa brtag pa dang / rin po che brtag pa dang / glang po che brtag pa dang / rta brtag pa dang / bud med brtag pa dang / skyes pa brtag pa dang / shing
brtag pa la nye bar zhugs te/ de brtag pa brgyad rnams la byang zhing 'byed pa dang / klog pa la g.yer por gyur to/ /de'i phas 'dug pa'i khang ba gsum po dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar
gyi brtsigs so/ /skyed mos tshal gsum po dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi brtsigs nas/ chung ma gsum po chen ma dang / bar ma dang / chun ma nye bar bzhag nas/ de steng gi khang
bzang gi gzhi la skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /khyim bdag stobs kyi sde ni rtag tu zhing las kyi mtha' la 'bad do/ /des pha de rtag par
zhing las kyi mtha' la 'bad pa mthong nas/ de la smras pa/ yab khyod ci'i phyir rtag tu zhing las kyi mtha' la 'bad/ des smras pa/ bu khyod ji ltar steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na/ skyes pa med
par rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod bar byed pa de bzhin du ngas kyang rtsed mo byas/ dga' bar byas/ dga' mgur spyad na/ ring por mi thogs par bdag cag gi longs spyod
'gribs shing / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ yab gal te de lta na bdag zong thogs te/ yul gyi mthar mchi'o/ /bu re zhig nga
la rin po che'i rigs gal te/ khyod kyis til dang 'bras dang rgya shug dang mon sran bzhin du rin po che yongs su spyad kyang rin po che dag yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ba nga la yod do/ /des
yang dang yang du smras pa/ yab bdag ni zong thogs la/ yul gyi mthar mchi'o/ /des de nges par gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo / /khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes gnas pa'i grong
du dril bsgrags nas/ gnas pa'i grong na/ gnas pa'i shes ldan tshod pa dag nyon cig /gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'gyur gyis shes ldan khyed las gang
zhig gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri dang lhan cig sho gam med pa dang / gsel ba'i rngan pa mi dgos pa dang / gru btsas mi dgos par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par spro ba de dag rgya mtsho chen por
'gro ba'i zong sngogs shig /tshong pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i zong sta gon byas so/ /khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes tshong pa lnga brgya po rang gi khyim du mgron du bos te/ zan byin
nas smras pa/ shes ldan tshong pa dag nyon cig /gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri ji ltar bdag gi bu yin pa de bzhin du khyed kyi yang yin gyis 'di la khyed rnams kyis gnod pa spang bar bya zhing
phan pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dpon po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa rnams kyis khyim bdag stobs kyi sde'i ltar nyan to/ /de nas khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes/ gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di
skad ces smras so/ bu khyod kyis ji ltar nga las tshig mnyan par bya zhing bsgrub par bya bar sems pa de bzhin du tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi yang mnyan par bya zhing bsgrub dgos pa soms
shig /khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes bsams pa/ gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri bzhon pa ci 'dra ba zhig gis gtang snyam mo/ /des bsams pa gal te glang po che'i bzhon pas 'gro na ni/ de shin

tu bskyang dga' zhing dgang dka'o/ /rta yang bskyang dka' la dgang dka'o/ /bong bu ni gso sla zhing dran pa dang ldan pas/ bong bu'i bzhon pas gtang ngo snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ bu grogs kyi thog
ma dang / tha ma nas ma 'gro zhig /gal te chom rkun pa mthu dang ldan par gyur na ni mgron pa'i thog ma nas 'joms so/ /gal te mthu chung bar gyur na ni tha ma nas 'joms kyis khyod tshong pa'i dbus

nas 'gro bar bya ste/ ded dpon bcom pas ni tshong pa rnams bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /bran dang skyong ba la smras pa/ khyed gnyis kyis rnam grangs gang gi kyang / gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtang bar
mi bya'o/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas nas/ ma'i gan du song ste/ yum bdag mchi phyag
'tshal lo/ /des du bar brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ yum ci'i phyir bshum/ bu khyod gson por kho mo dang nam zhig phrad snyam mo/ /des bsams pa/
bdag bkra shes par byas te chas pa la/ 'di 'dra ba'i bkra mi shis pa smra'o snyam nas/ de mi bzod pa skyes te/ smras pa/ ngan song la ci'i phyir mi gzigs/ des smras pa/ bu khyod kyis
dag gis las rtsub po phyung gis/ nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig dang / des na las de nyid bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /des de la nyes pa la nyes par
bzod par gsol to/ /de nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas nas/ shing rta dang / khur dang / pang tshad dang / gzeb rnams

dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu rnams la zong mang po bkal nas rgya mtsho chen por chas te/ de dag rim gyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / tshong 'dus rnams nas rgyu zhing
rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin nas/ rgya mtsho'i gru bo che phun sum tshogs pa zhig bsgrubs te/ nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis
bdas te rin po che'i gling du phyin to/ /des der brtags brtags nas/ rin po che rnams kyis gru bo che dper na til lam/ 'bras sam/ rgya shug gam/ mon sran bzhin du bkang nas

de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis bdas te gru bo che nye zho med par 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin nas tshong pa de dag rgya mtsho'i 'gram de nyid du brang btab bo/ /des kyang bran dang skyong ba khrid de phyogs gcig tu dong
nas/ 'du ba dang 'god pa'i rtsis bya bar brtsams so/ /phyi zhig nas des bran la smras pa/ bran tshong pa rnams ci dag byed ltos shig /de der song na/ ji tsam na tshong pa rnams gnyid log pa mthong
nas/ de yang de nyid du nyal lo/ bran ring zhig thogs nas/ des skyong ba la smras pa/ skyong ba tshong pa rnams ci dag byed ltos shig /des der song na/ ji tsam na tshong pa rnams khal 'gel ba
mthong nas/ des kyang khal 'gel bar brtsams so/ /bran gyis bsams pa/ skyong bas ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/ /skyong bas bsams pa/ bran gyis ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/ /tshong
pa de dag ni khal bkal nas dong ngo / /gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri ni gnyid kyis myos nas nyal lo/ /tshong pa de rnams dong ba las ci tsam na nam langs nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan
dag ded dpon ga re/ ded dpon sngar song ngo / /sngon du song nas ded dpon ga re zhes dris pa dang mjug nas 'ong / mjug tu song ste/ ded dpon ga re/ zhes dris pa dang / bar nas song ngo / /bar
du song ste dris pa las/ gang na yang mi snang nas bran gyis smras pa/ bdag gis blo skyes pa skyong bas ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/ /skyong bas kyang smras pa/ bdag gis blo skyes ba bran gyis
ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/ /shes ldan dag gang yang bdag cag gis ded dpon bor nas 'dong ba ni bzang po ma yin gyis phyir dong gis tshur sheg /de dag gis
smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gal te bdag cag phyir log na/ thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal par 'gyur gyis tshur sheg /re zhig nang khrims shig bca' bar bya ste/ gang
yang bdag cag gis rdzas rnams ma brubs kyi bar du re zhig sus kyang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri'i pha ma la gtam bsnyad par mi bya'o zhes de rnams kyis nang khrims su bca' ba dag byas nas

dong ngo / /gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri'i pha mas gro bzhin skye rna ba bye ba ri 'ongs so zhes thos nas/ de gnyis bsur dong nas ded dpon ga re sngar song ngo / /de gnyis sngon du song nas ded dpon ga
re zhes dris pa dang / mjug nas 'ong ngo / /mjug tu dong nas ded dpon ga re zhes dris pa dang / bar nas song ngo zhes rdzas rnams brubs kyi par du mgo rmongs su bcug nas/ de'i 'og tu
smras pa/ yab yum bdag cag gis ded dpon brjed do/ /de gnyis kyi drung du gcig cig 'ongs nas/ yab yum gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri mchis so zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis
de la rngan pa byin nas bsur dong na ma mthong ngo / /yang gzhan zhig 'ongs nas yab yum gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri mchis so zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis de la rngan pa byin nas bsur
dong na cad ma mthong ste/ de ltar su la yang yid mi ches so/ /de gnyis kyis skyed mos tshal dang / lha khang dang / 'dun khang rnams su gdugs dang / dril bu dang / rnga yab rnams phul nas
gal te gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gson par gyur na myur du 'ong ba dang / la gor 'ong bar gyur cig /gal te dus las 'das te shi 'phos par gyur na/ 'gro ba'i gnas khyad par can du skye bar
gyur cig ces yi ger bris so/ de gnyis ni mya ngan dang / ngud mos long bar gyur to/ /de yang nyi ma 'char ka'i nyi zer gyis phog nas sad na/ de na bong bu gnyis 'dug pa ma gtogs par tshong pa

gang yang ma mthong ngo / /des de gnyis sbrel te/ ded de song ba na rlung langs pas lam bye mas yog pa bong bu dran pa dang ldan pas lam snas snom zhing dal gyis song ba dang / de lcag gzer bu can gyis gzhus

shing ded pa las/ de gnyis kyi dran pa 'khrugs nas/ shing sA la'i dgon pa zhig tu phyin to/ /de gnyis skom pas sro shi zhing lce phyung ste phan tshun 'thom pa des mthong nas snying rje skyes te/ des bsams
pa| gal te bdag gis ma bzhag na/ 'di dang lhan cig tu tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des de gnyis bor te rkang bas song ba las/ des ji tsam nas lcags kyi grong khyer

mtho zhing rgya che ba de'i sgo na skyes bu gnag la che ba/ mig dmar ba byin snyig rlob lag na dbyug pa thogs pa zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/ de de'i drung du song ste/ kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/ de yang
cang mi smra bar 'dug go /des yang dris pa/ kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/ 'on kyang de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /des der zhugs te/ chu chu zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ba dang /
yi dwags lus sdong dum chig pa 'dra ba/ rus gong bsgreng ba lta bu rang gi spu dang / skras yog pa lto ri sul ltar 'dug pa/ khab kyi mig tsam gyi kha yod pa/ brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas
gro bzhin skyes snying rje dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag cag skom pa la chu lud cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag kyang chu slong na/ bdag gis chu blud du ga la yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ gro
bzhin skyes yi dwags kyi grong khyer 'di na chu ga la yod/ bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du chu chu zhes bya ba'i ming deng thos so/ /shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig /las gang gis 'dir
skyes| gro bzhin skyes/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/ /shes ldan dag bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na/ ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/ de dag
gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag dag rtsub khro ldan zhing / /bdag cag ser sna 'jungs ba can/ /sbyin pa cung zad ma btang des/ /bdag cag yi dwags 'jig rten lhags/ /gro bzhin

skyes khyod bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan gyis song zhig /yi dwags kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson por 'gro ba 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/ de song ba dang / ji tsam na skyes bu de

mthong nas/ des de la smras pa/ e ma'o bzhin bzang / khyod kyis kho bo la 'di lta ste/ 'di ni yi dwags kyi grong khyer yin no zhes smras pa dang / kho bo der mi 'jug pa zhig /des smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes
khyed bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan gyis song zhig /yi dwags kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson bor 'gro bar 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/ de song ba las ji tsam na/ lcags kyi

grong khyer mtho zhing rgya che ba zhig gi sgo na/ skyes bu gnag la che ba/ mig dmar ba byin snying rlo ba lag na dbyig pa thogs pa zhig 'dug ba mthong nas/ de de'i drung du song ste/ kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/ de

cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / de la yang kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/ de 'on kyang mi smra bar 'dug go /des der zhugs te/ chu chu zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ba dang / yi dwags sdong dum tshig pa 'dras rus gong

bsgreng ba lta bu rang gi skra dang spus yog pa/ lto ri sul ltar 'dug pa/ khab kyi mig tsam gyi kha yod pa brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas/ gro bzhin skyes snying rje dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag cag skom
pa rnams la chu lud cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag nyid kyang chu slong na/ bdag gis chu blud du ga la yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes yi dwags kyi grong khyer 'di na/ chu ga la
yod/ bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis lon na chu chu zhes bya ba'i sgra khyod las deng thos so/ /shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig /las gang gis 'dir skyes/ de dag gis smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes
'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/ /shes ldan dag bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na/ ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/ de dag
gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nad med rgyags pas myos pa dang / /lang tsho longs spyod dregs myos te/ /sbyin pa ci yang ma btang bas/ /bdag cag yi dwags 'jig rten lhags/ /gro bzhin skyes khyod
bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas song zhig /yi dwags kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson por 'gro ba 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/ de song ba dang / ji tsam na skyes bu de mthong

nas des de la smras pa/ e ma'o bzhin bzang khyod kyis kho bo la 'di lta ste/ 'di ni yi dwags kyi grong khyer yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang / kho bo der mi 'jug pa zhig /des smras ba/ gro bzhin skyes khyod

bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas song zhig /yi dwags kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson por 'gro ba 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/ de song ba dang / ji tsam na nyi ma nub ka'i dus su
gzhal med khang zhig mthong ste/ de na lha mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa bzhi dang / skyes bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub kor dang / byug

pa dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gcig de dang de dag tu lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de dag gis de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas de dag gis so
so nas smra bar brtsams pa/ gro bzhin skyes 'ongs pa legs so/ /mi skom mam/ mi bkres sam/ des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin zhig yin no snyam nas/ bdag skom

mo| |bdag bkres so/ /de dag gis khrus byas nas zan byin te de gzhal med khang de nyid du ji tsam nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du 'dug pa dang / de la de dag gis smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes 'dir nyes dmigs dag

'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ byung shig /de byung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste gnas so/ /de nas phyi zhig na nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe gzhal med khang de yang mi snang / lha'i bu mo yang mi snang bar gyur te/ khyi sre bo

bzhi zhig byung nas de dag gis skyes pa de kha sbub tu bsnyal te/ rgyab kyi sha lpags kham tshad du bcad de/ ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du zos so/ /de'i 'og tu yang gzhal med khang yang slar byung / lha'i bu mo yang

byung bar gyur te/ skyes pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub kor dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ de dang de dag tu lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de de dag gi drung du song nas shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig /las gang gis 'dir skyes/ gro bzhin skyes 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka'
ba yin pas yid mi ches so/ /shes ldan dag bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na/ ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/ gro bzhin skyes bdag gnas pa'i grong gi bshan par gyur pa na lug bsad pa'i sha
btsongs pas 'tsho bar byed pa las 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byon nas bzhin bzang las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin ba ni yid du mi
'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces gsungs na/ des gsungs pa de bzhin du bdag gis ma spangs pa dang / des bdag la spong du gzhug pa'i phyir yang dang yang du
bzhin bzang las 'di 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces gsungs nas 'on kyang bdag gis ma spangs nas/ des bdag la rmas
pa| bzhin bzang khyod ci lug nyin par ram/ nub mo gsod/ bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa nyin bar ro/ /des ci'i phyir nub mo tshul khrims yang dag par ma nod pa mi bzung zhes gsungs nas/
de las bdag gis nub mo tshul khrims yang dag par mnos te/ bzung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus/ nub mo 'di lta bu'i bde ba nyams su myong ngo / /gang yang nyin par lug
bsad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nyin par 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo / /tshigs su bcad de yang smras pa/ nyin par gzhan gyi srog gcod cing / /nub mo tshul khrims yon

tan ldan/ /las de'i 'bras bu bzang po dang / /sdig to 'di ni myong ba yin/ /gro bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa'i grong du 'gro'am/ de na bdag gi bu bshan pa bgyid pa de la/ khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/ de
na re/ las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong pa yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces zer ro zhes gsungs shig /kye nang rje/ khyod kyis khe bo la 'dzam bu'i gling
pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches bar dka'o zhes smras pas yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /gro bzhin skyes gal te yid mi ches na/ de la khyod kyi pha de na re/ ral gris bsad pa'i sa'i 'og na gser phye bum pa gang

bzhag gis de phyung ste/ bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang / dus dus su 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul la bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste/ yon bsngo ba byos shig /des
na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs shig /de song ba las ji tsam na/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su gzhal med khang gzhan zhig mthong ste/ de na lha mo gzugs

bzang ba mdzes ba blta na sdug ba gcig dang / skyes ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub kor dang / byug ba dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gcig dang der lhan
cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de de dag gis rgyang ring po nas mthong nas so so nas smra bar brtsams pa/ gro bzhin skyes 'ongs pa legs so/ /mi skom mam/ mi bkres
sam| des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin zhig yin no snyam nas/ bdag skom mo/ /bdag bkres so/ /de dag gis de khrus byas nas zan byin te/ de gzhal med khang du
ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar 'dug pa dang / de la de dag gis smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes 'dir nyes dmigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur gyis byung zhig /des nyes dmigs dag

mthong nas byung ste mtha' cig tu 'dug go /de'i 'og tu nyi ma nub ka'i dus kyi tshe/ de na gzhal med khang yang mi snang / lha mo de yang mi snang gi /srin gyi me chen po zhig byung ste/ des skyes ba de'i lus
la lus kyis lan bdun du dkris nas steng du byung ste/ des nam nyi ma ma shar ba'i bar du klad rgyas za bar byed do// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas de'i 'og

tu gzhal med khang yang slar byung / lha mo de yang slar byung nas/ skyes pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dpung rgyan dang rna cha gdub kor dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyis
brgyan pa/ de dang der lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de dag gi drung du song ste/ song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig /las gang gis 'dir skyes/
gro bzhin skyes 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/ /bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na ji ltar yid mi ches par gyur/ des smras pa/ gnas pa'i grong na
bdag bram zer gyur te byi bo byed pa las/ 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen pos bdag la thugs brtse bas phyir byon nas gsungs pa/ bzhin bzang las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi
'ong pa yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces gsungs nas/ des gsungs pa bzhin du bdag gis ma spangs pa dang / des bdag la spong du gzhug pa'i phyir yang dang yang du
bzhin bzang las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces gsungs na/ 'on kyang bdag gis de ma spangs so/ /des bdag la

smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod nyin bar byi bo la 'gro 'am/ nub mo/ bdag gis de la smras pa/ 'phags pa nub mo'o/ /des bzhin bzang ci'i phyir nyin par tshul khrims yang dag par mnos te mi gzung / des na las
de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs nas de las bdag gis nyin par tshul khrims yang dag par mnos te bzung ngo / /gang yang nyin par tshul khrims yang dag

par mnos te bzung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nyin par bde ba 'di lta bu nyams su myong ngo / /gang yang mtshan mo byi bo byed du song ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtshan mo sdug bsngal 'di lta bu

nyams su myong bar gyur to/ /tshigs su bcad de yang smras pa/ mtshan mo byi bo byed la chags/ /nyin par tshul khrims yon tan ldan/ /las de'i 'bras bu bzang po dang / /sdig to 'di ni myong ba yin/ /gro

bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa'i grong du 'gro'am/ de na bdag gi bu bram ze byi bo byed pa la/ khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/ de na re/ las 'di'i rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis/ dam pa ma yin pa'i
chos sdig pa spongs shig ces zer ro zhes gsungs shig /des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod na re/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka'o zhes smras pa/ yid

ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /gro bzhin skyes gal te yid mi ches na/ de la khyod kyi pha na re/ me thab kyi 'og na gser phye bum pa gang bzhag gis de phyung ste/ bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang / dus

dus su 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul la bdag cag gis ming nas phyung ste yon bsngo ba byos shig dang / des na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs pa 'gyur ro zhes

zer ro zhes gsungs shig /de song pa dang / ji tsam na gzhal med khang gzhan zhig mthong ste/ de na bud med gzugs bzang ba mdzes ba blta na sdug pa/ dpung rgyan dang rna cha gdub kor dang / byug pa dang / phreng

ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhig 'dug pa de'i khri'i rkang pa bzhi la yi dwags bzhi btags shing 'dug go /des de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so//
mi skom mam/ mi bkres sam/ des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar lha mo'am/ klu mo'am/ gnod sbyin ma zhig yin no snyam nas/ des smras pa/ bdag skom mo/ /bdag bkres so/ /des de khrus byas nas
zan byin te/ de la smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes gal te khyod la 'di dag cung zad slong na/ ma byin cig ces smras nas/ sems can de rnams kyis las bdag gir bya ba mngon sum du bya bar 'dod nas gzhal

med khang gi nang du zhugs te 'dug go /de dag gis bslang bar brtsams te/ gro bzhin skyes snying rje dang ldan ba khyod kyis bdag cag bkres pas nyen pa la byin cig /des gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang / phub
mar gyur to/ /yang gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang / lcags kyi thu lum za bar gyur to/ /yang gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang de rang gi sha la za bar gyur to/ /yang gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang /

rnag khrag tu gyur to/ /de dri tshor nas byung ste/ gro bzhin skyes khyod la kho mos ma bzlog gam/ ci'i phyir 'di dag la sbyin/ ci kho mo'i snying rje las khyod kyi snying rje lhag gam/ des smras pa/ sring mo 'di dag khyod
kyi cir 'ongs/ des smras pa 'di ni kho mo'i khyim thab yin/ 'di ni bu yin/ 'di ni mna' ma yin/ 'di ni kho mo'i bran mo yin no/ /khyed cag su dag yin/ las gang gis 'dir skyes/ gro bzhin skyes
'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/ /sring mo bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/ des smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes kho mo gnas

ba zhes bya ba'i grong gi bram ze mor gyur pa na/ rgyu skar la bab pa'i nub mo kha zas bsod pa dag sta gon byas pa dang / 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po kho mo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnas pa'i grong du bsod

snyoms la gshegs te/ rim gyis kho mo'i khyim du byon pa dang / kho mos de'i sku mdzes shing thugs dang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kho mo mngon par dad par gyur te/ de la kho mo dad pa skyes nas bsod
snyoms phul te/ kho mo'i blo skyes pa de la khyim thab rjes su yi rang ba 'bul du bcug na rab tu dga' ba skyes par 'gyur ro snyam pa las/ de khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang /
de la kho mos smras pa/ rje'i sras 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la kho mos bsod snyoms phul gyis rjes su yi rang ba phul cig /de khros nas smras pa/ ji srid bram ze rnams la ma phul/ gnyen
bshes rnams la gnyen gyi sri zhu ma byas par je khyod kyis dge sbyong mgo reg de la bsod snyoms kyi phud byin nam zhes de mi bzod pa skyes nas/ dge sbyong mgo reg de ci'i phyir phub ma mi 'gam zhes
smras pas/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas phub ma 'gam par gyur to/ /kho mo'i blo skyes pa/ khyim thab kyis rjes su yi rang bam phul gyis/ re zhig bu rjes su yi rang ba 'bul du bcug na dga' ba
skye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ kho mos de la yang smras pa/ bu 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la kho mos bsod snyoms phul gyis rjes su yi rang ba phul cig /de yang khros te smras pa/ ji srid bram ze
rnams la ma byin par/ je khyod kyis dge sbyong mgo reg de la bsod snyoms kyi phud sbyin nam zhes de mi bzod pa skyes nas dge sbyong mgo reg de ci'i phyir lcags kyi thu lum mi za zhes smras pas /
de las de'i rnam par smin pas lcags kyi thu lum za bar gyur to/ /gro bzhin skyes rgyu skar la bab pa'i nub mo gnyen dag gis kho mo la dbyar gzigs shig bskur ba de/ kho mos mna' ma la
gtad na/ des dbyar gzigs bsod pa bsod pa dag ni zos la/ ngan pa dag kho mo la byin no/ /kho mos gnyen de dag la khyod cag lo nyes sam ci/ 'di lta bu'i dbyar gzigs ngan pa bskur/ de rnams
kyis kho mo la bdag cag gis dbyar gzigs ngan pa ni ma bskur te/ de lta mod kyi dbyar gzigs bsod pa zhig bskur ro zhes spring pa 'ongs nas/ kho mos mna' ma la smras pa/ bag gsar khyod kyis

dbyar gzigs bsod pa dag ni zos la/ ngan pa dag kho mo la ma byin grang / de smras pa/ khyod kyis dbyar gzigs za na/ bdag rang gi sha ci'i phyir mi za zhes smras pas/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas rang gi
sha za bar gyur to/ /rgyu skar la bab pa'i nub mo kho mos bran mo la dbyar gzigs bsod pa dag cig lag tu bskur te/ gnyen bshes kyi gan du btang ba las/ des lam khar dbyar gzigs bsod pa dag
zos nas/ de dag la ngan pa dag byin pa dang / de dag gis kho mo la khyod lo nyes sam ci/ bdag cag la dbyar gzigs ngan pa dag bskur zhes spring ba thos nas/ kho mos de dag la kho mos khyed cag
la dbyar gzigs ngan pa ni ma bskur te/ de lta mod kyi dbyar gzigs bsod pa zhig bskur ro zhes spring ngo / /kho mos bran mo la dris pa/ bran mo dbyar gzigs bsod pa dag khyod kyis zos la de dag la

ngan pa dag ma byin grang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi dbyar gzigs za na rnag khrag ci'i phyir mi 'thung zhes smras pas/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas rnag khrag 'thung bar gyur to/ /bdag gi blo skyes pa/ gang
du sems can 'di dag rang rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba der/ nying mtshams sbyor zhing lta bar gyur cig snyam mo/ /kho mos gang yang 'phags
pa ka t+yA yan chen po la bsod snyoms phul bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas bzang por skye bar 'gyur ba las/ bdag gis smon lam log par btab pas da ltar yi dwags mthu chen mo

zhig tu skyes so/ /gro bzhin skyes yang gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong du 'gro na/ de na kho mo'i bu mo smad 'tshong byed pa de la khyod kyi pha dang / ma dang / ming po dang / mna' ma dang / bran mo dag ngas
mthong ste/ de dag na re/ las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces zer ro zhes gsungs shig /sring mo khyod nyid na re
'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches pa dka'o zhes smras pas yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes gal te yid mi ches na/ khyod kyi pha'i sngon gyi khang pa na lcags
zangs gser gyis gang bzung bzhi dang / dbus na gser gyi 'khar pa dang / ril pa spyi blugs shig yod kyis de dag phyung ste/ bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang / dus dus su
'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms dbul zhing bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste/ yon bsngo ba byos shig dang / de na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs
par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro zhes gsungs shig /des de la khas blangs te/ de de ltar 'khyam pa la lo bcu gnyis 'das so/ /des de la smras pa/ gro bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa'i grong du 'gro'am/ sring mo

'gro'o zhes de gzhal med khang de'i nang du zhugs pa dang / des yi dwags de rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri nyal bzhin du gnas pa'i grong gi pha'i skyed mos tshal
du zhog la slar shegs shig /de dag gis de gnas pa'i grong du pha'i skyed mos tshal du bzhag go /de gnyid sad pa dang / ji tsam na dril bu dang / gdugs dang / bsil yab rnams phul nas/ gal te
gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gson por zhig na la gor 'ong zhing myur du 'ong bar shog cig /'on te dus las 'das te/ shi 'phos par gyur na/ 'gro ba'i gnas khyad par can du skyes par gyur
cig ces yi ge bris pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ 'di ltar bdag pha dang / mas shi ba'i khongs su brtsis na/ ci'i phyir slar khyim du 'jug /bdag song la 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i

drung du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po gang na ba der song ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen pos gro bzhin skyes rna ba

bye ba ri rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di skad ces smras so/ gro bzhin skyes chur shog /gro bzhin skyes khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /gro bzhin skyes
'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol mthong ngam/ btsun pa ka t+yA ya na chen po ma thong ngo / /btsun pa ka t+yA ya na chen pa bdag lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ btsun pa ka t+yA ya na chen pos bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par 'tshal lo/ /

gro bzhin skyes re zhig sngon gyi dam bcas pa dran par byos la/ tha na ji skad sbring zhing bzung ba chub par skyol cig /de bshan pa de'i drung du song nas/ bzhin bzang khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/ de na
re| las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces zer ro/ /des smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag gi pha ni shi nas deng lo bcu
gnyis lon na/ khyod kyis 'jig rten pha rol nas slar 'ongs pa 'ga' yang mthong ba yod dam/ bzhin bzang bdag der son to/ /de yid ma ches pa dang / bzhin bzang ji ste yid ma ches na/ de na
re| khyod kyi pha'i ral gris bsad pa'i 'og na gser phye bum pa gang bzhag gis de phyung la/ bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang / dus dus su 'phags pa ka t+yA yan chen po la
bsod snyoms phul la/ bdag cag gis ming nas phyung ste/ yon bsngo ba byos shig dang / des na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /des
bsams pa/ bdag gis sngon chad ni de lta bu lan 'ga' yang ma thos na/ re zhig bltas te/ gal te byung bar gyur na/ zer ba de thams cad bden no snyam nas/ des song ste brkos nas ji tsam na

mthong ba dang / de thams cad de kho na bzhin du gyur te/ des yid ches par gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu byi bo byed pa de'i drung du song ste/ song nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/ de na re/
las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces zer ro/ /des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bdag gi pha shi nas deng du lo bcu
gnyis lon na khyod kyis 'jig rten pha rol nas 'ongs pa 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/ bzhin bzang bdag der son to/ /yid ma ches nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzang gal te yid mi ches na pha na re/
khyod kyi pha'i me thab kyi 'og na gser phye bum pa gang bzhag gis/ de phyung la bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang / dus dus su 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul
la bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste/ yon bsngo ba byos shig dang / de na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes de skad zer ro/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gis
de skad sngon chad ni/ la na 'ga' yang ma thos na/ gal te byung bar gyur na/ zer ba de thams cad bden no snyam nas/ des song ste brkos nas ji tsam na mthong ba dang / de thams cad de kho na
bzhin du gyur te des yid ches par gyur to/ /de'i 'og tu gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri smad 'tshong ma de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyi pha dang / ma dang / ming po
dang | mna' ma dang / bran mo dag ngas mthong ste/ de dag na re/ las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spongs shig ces zer ro/ /
des smras pa/ kye skyes bu bdag gi pha dang ma dag shi nas deng du lo bcu gnyis lon na/ khyod kyis 'jig rten pha rol nas 'ongs pa 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ bdag der son
to| |de yid ma ches pa dang / des smras pa/ sring mo gal te yid mi ches na/ de dag na re/ khyod kyi pha'i sngon gyi khang pa rnying pa na lcags zangs gser phyes gang ba zung bzhi dang / dbus na gser
gyi 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs yod kyis/ de dag phyung la bdag la yun ring du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang / dus dus su 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul la/ bdag
cag gi ming nas phyung ste/ yon bsngo ba byos shig dang / de na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gis sngon
chad ni de lta bu lan 'ga' yang mthos na blta bar bya ste/ gal te byung bar gyur na zer ba de thams cad bden no snyam nas des song ste brkos nas ji tsam na mthong ba dang / des thams cad
de kho na bzhin du gyur te/ des yid ches par gyur to/ /gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris bsams pa/ 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad ni/ gser gyis yid ches kyis/ bdag la ni 'ga' yang yid ches par ma

gyur to snyam nas/ des 'dzum phyung ba dang / de byis pa na mche ba gser gyis brgyan pa de/ des ngo shes par gyur nas/ dpon po gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba re yin nam/ sring mo bdag ni skye bo dag gis de

ltar shes so/ /des song nas de'i pha ma la/ yab yum gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri mchis so zhes sbran pa nas du ma zhig gis sbran na yang de dag yid ma ches nas/ ji tsam na de rang nyid 'ongs te/ yab
yum phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / de dbyig gi nga ro can zhig pas de gnyis kyi skad las ngo shes nas de gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'jus te du bar brtsams pa dang / de gnyis mchi ma byung
bas mig gi ling tog byid nas blta bar brtsams so/ /des smras pa/ yab yum bdag yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu khyod
kyi mya ngan dang dud mos bdag cag mig ldongs par gyur pa las da khyod nyid 'ongs nas bdag cag gi mig sor chud kyis/ bdag ji srid gson pa de srid du rab tu ma 'byung bar nam shi bar gyur ba de'i

tshe rab tu byung zhig /des tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i drung du chos mnyan pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /pha dang ma gnyis kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i
gzhi rnams la bkod do/ /lung bzhi rtogs par byas te/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /pha dang ma gnyis kyang bden pa rnams la bkod
do| |dus gzhan zhig na/ de'i pha dang ma shi nas des nor de dag phongs pa dang mgon med pa dang bkres pa dang nyams thag pa rnams la byin te/ bkren pa phal mo che zhig dbul bor nas/
tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig
tu 'dug nas/ gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen pos
de rab tu phyung ngo / /des rab tu phyung nas/ ma mo rtogs par byas te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /rdo can zhes bya ba'i yul gyi mtha' na dge slong gi tshogs nyung ste grangs
bcur bskang ba dka' nas/ des de zla ba gsum du dge tshul du bzhag go /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa ni gnyis su gyur te/ 'dus

pa chen po ni dbyar zla 'bring po'i dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa la gang yin pa dang / ston zla 'bring po'i nya la gang yin pa'o/ /de la gang dag dbyar zla 'bring po'i dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa la 'dus pa de dag

ni yid la byed pa'i khyad par de dang de dag bzung nas chub par byas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dang de rnams su dbyar gnas par

dam 'cha'o/ /gang dag ston zla 'bring po nya la 'dus pa de dag ni/ ji ltar rtogs pa dag smras nas gong ma dag 'dri bar byed de nyan thos chen po rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka
t+yA ya na chen po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas kyi dge slong dag gis yid la byed pa'i khyad par de dang de dag bzung nas chub par byas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul
'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dang de rnams su dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /de dag gis dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa

dang ldan nas/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag
byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de dag gis ji ltar rtogs pa dag smras te/ gong ma dag kyang 'dri'o/ /tshogs kyi grangs kyang bcur bskangs nas/ des de bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so//
des sde snod gsum rtogs par byas nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing / dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi
'dod chags dang bral ba gyo mo dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems/ tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bral ba/ rig
pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti las phyir phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa

rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas kyi dge slong rnams kyis
tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po ni bdag cag gis mthong ste/ bsnyen bkur yang bgyis
lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag rnams bsnyen bkur bgyid du mchi'o/ /bu dag de bzhin du gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rnams ni bsnyen bkur bya ba kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'khor de nyid kyi nang du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri
stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gis mkhan po yang
mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku ni mthong na/ gzugs kyi sku ma mthong bas mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku bltar mchi'o/ /bu de bzhin du gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba ni rnyed pa dka' ste/ dper na me tog u dum wA ra dang mtshungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byos la
bdag gi tshig 'dis reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar dang / zhu ba lnga po 'di dag kyang zhus shig /btsun pa rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na dge slong nyung bas grangs bcur bskang ba
dka' na/ de la ji ltar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi/ btsun pa ba lang gi rjes kyis sa rtsub por gyur ba dang / rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na 'di lta bu'i gding ba dang / dgab pa 'di
lta ste/ lug gi pags pa dang / ba'i ko ba dang / ri dwags kyi pags pa dang / ra'i pags pa las bgyid do/ /ji ltar yul gzhan dag na/ 'di lta bu'i gding ba dang dag ba pa 'di lta ste/ bal
stan dang / shing shun gyi stan dang / srin bal gyi stan dang / ras bal gyi stan dag mchis pa de bzhin du rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na 'di lta bu'i gding ba dang / dgab pa 'di lta
ste| lug gi pags pa dang zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin no/ /chus 'dag par 'tshal ba'i mi rnams rtag par khrus la spyod pa dang / dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos
bskur ba tshu rol nas ni sbags la/ der ni ma mchis na/ de gang la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhes zhus shig /tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris cang mi smra bas/ tshe dang
ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po las mnyan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ tshe
dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro'i dus su sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang
chos gos thogs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ ji tsam nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri lhung
bzed dang / chos gos mkhos su phab nas/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la de bzhin gshegs pa dang gro bzhin skyes
rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag khang gcig tu khri shoms shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dang | gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag khang gcig tu khri bshams nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag khang gcig tu khri bshams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das dang / gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs te/ byon nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas
dgongs pa mngon du bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri yang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ skyil
mo krung bcas lus bsrang nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'phags pa'i mi smra bas/ de'i
mtshan mo 'das par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam nangs su nye ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la bka' stsal pa/ gro bzhin skyes chos gang la
bdag gis mngon par shes te/ mngon par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa la khyed spobs par gyis shig /de nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri bcom ldan 'das kyis
skabs phye ba dang / rdo can zhes bya ba'i mtha'i dbyangs kyi nga ros ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol 'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / rig gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / thub pa'i
tshigs su bcad pa dang / gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde dag gsang bstod de bton to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris brjod pa rdzogs par mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ril 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gro bzhin
skyes khyod kyis gang la bdag gis mngon par shes te/ mngon par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa'i chos gya nom pa dang snyan par bsgrags pa legs so legs so/ /de nas tshe dang
ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'di snyam du sems te/ de bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mkhan pos phrin gsol ba smra ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du rig nas/ stan las
langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa rdo can
zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i grong na/ btsun pa ka t+yA ya na chen po mchis pa de bdag gi mkhan po lags te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang bde ba dang nyam nga ba ma mchis pas bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol lags so/ /gro
bzhin skyes dge slong ka t+yA ya na bde bar gyur cig /zhu ba lnga po dag kyang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |gro bzhin skyes re zhig ngas zhu ba 'di lung bstan pa'i dus la ma bab kyis/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhu ba zhus shig dang / der khyod kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa'i dus la bab bo/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das nang par sngar bzhengs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes zhes bya ba nas phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na
gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i grong na/ btsun pa ka t+yA ya na chen po mchis pa de bdag gi mkhan po lags te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la zhes bya ba nas/ bde ba la reg par
spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /zhu ba lnga po gong du ji skad du spang ba'i ltung byed kyi bar brjod pa yang rgyas par gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste yul mtha' 'khob rnams su 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu khrus bya ba dang / mchil lham rim
gcig pa 'chang bar bya ste/ rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin no/ /gal te zad par gyur na lhan pas btab ste bcang bar bya'o/ /ko ba bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong
gis dge slong la chos gos bskur ba tshu rol nas spags la der ma phyin na/ gang la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor
gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' 'khob rnams su 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la dbus
ni gang lags/ mtha' 'khob ni gang lags/ nye bar 'khor shar phyogs na/ li kha ra shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong yod pa de'i shar phyogs na li kha ra tshang tshing zhes bya ba'i tshal yod
de de ni dbus so/ /de phan chad ni mtha' 'khob bo/ /lho phyogs na 'dam bu can zhes bya ba'i grong yod pa/ de'i pha rol na 'dam bu can zhes bya ba'i chu bo yod pa de ni dbus so/ /de phan
chad ni mtha' 'khob bo/ /nub phyogs na bram ze'i grong ka ba dang / nye ba'i ka ba dag yod de de ni dbus so/ /de phan chad ni mtha' 'khob bo/ /byang phyogs na u shi ri'i ri zhes bya ba yod de de ni
dbus so/ /de phan chad ni mtha' 'khob bo/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes
rna ba bye ba ris las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/ phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs dang / rin po ches spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la thogs shing btsas la ngan song mthong
zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

dag gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye

dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam
par grags zhes bya ba'i bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /wA ra NA si'i grong na khyo shugs gnyis shig yod pa de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so/ /gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad ba mtha' dag mdzad nas phung po lhag
ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po kri kris de'i mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gang tsam la 'phang du
dpag tshad phyed pa zhig byed du bcug nas/ de zhig cing gogs pa dag slar bcos pa'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba gang yin pa de dag des mchod rten de la phul lo/ /

gang gi tshe rgyal po kri kri shi nas de'i bu legs skyes zhes bya ba de rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang / de'i blon po dag gis dpya nyung shas shig phul lo/ /des blon po rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod
kyis nga la dpya nyung du zhig phul/ nga'i yul nas dpya mi 'du'am zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ lha dpya de las 'du ba ga la mchis/ lha grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba
gang lags pa de dag ni/ rgyal po yab kyis mchod rten zhig cing gogs pa slar bcos pa'i rgyur bzhag go /gal te lhas gnang na/ dpya de bdag cag gis dgum mo/ /des smras pa/ shes
ldan nga'i yab kyis gang mdzad pa de ni tshangs pas byas pa'o/ /de ni brgya byin gyis byas pa'o/ /de dag gis bsams pa/ gal te lhas mi gnang na bdag cag gis ci nas dpya de dag rang 'du bar
mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam nas/ de dag gi sgo bcad de bzhag pas phyin chad dpya 'du ba chad do/ /mchod rten de yang zhig cing gogs par gyur pa dang / khyo shug de gnyis rgas pa gyur pa na/
mchod rten de nyid la byi bdar byed cing 'dug go /byang phyogs nas ded dpon zhig zong thogs nas/ wA ra NA si'i grong du phyin pa dang des mchod rten zhig cing gogs par gyur pa de mthong
ngo| |de mthong nas yab yum mchod rten 'di su'i lags zhes dris so/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi yin no/ /sus bgyis/ rgyal po kri kris so/ /
rgyal po kri kri des mchod rten zhig pa dang gogs pa slar bcos pa'i phyir phul ba cung zad med dam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ phul ba yod de/ grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba
gang dag mchod rten de zhig pa dang / gogs pa bcos pa'i phyir phul ba las rgyal po kri kri nongs nas/ de'i sras legs skyes zhes bya ba de rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ des dpya 'du ba de bcad pas
mchod rten de zhig cing gogs par gyur to/ /des rin po ches spras pa'i rna cha rna ba las phral nas des de gnyis la byin te smras pa/ yab yum rin po che'i rna cha 'dis mchod rten 'di zhig cing
gogs pa rnams chos shig /bdag nam zong rnams 'gyur te 'ongs nas phyis kyang sbyin no/ /de gnyis kyis de btsongs nas des mchod rten de zhig pa dang / gogs pa slar bcos te/ kha cig
ni lhag go /de nas dus phyis shig na ded dpon gyis zong bsgyur nas/ spogs khyer te 'ongs so/ /des mchod rten de blta bas mi ngoms pa zhig tu mthong ngo / /mthong
nas kyang de'i phyir zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / dang ba skyes te dris pa yab yum khyed kyi skyin po cung zad ma byas sam/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis skyin pa cung zad kyang ma byas te/
'on kyang lhag pa yang yod do/ /de rab tu dang ba skyes nas/ de la ci lhag pa dang / gzhan yang phul nas/ mchod pa dang / bkur sti cher byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag phyug pa dang / nor mang
ba dang / longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye ba dang / chos 'di lta bu 'thob pa dang / ston pa 'di lta bu kho na mnyes par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /dge
slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ ded dpon gang yin pa de ni gro bzhin skyes rna ba byi ba ri 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas
te| smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa dang nor mang ba dang longs spyod che ba'i rigs dang / rin po ches spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la thogs bzhin du btsas shing nga'i bstan pa la
rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang / shugs mnyam pa/ stobs mnyam
pa| brtson pa mnyam pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa brnyes pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyis ma mnyes par ni ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi
rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams ni dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams ni 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /
'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris
las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas mthong bas chos 'di nyid la ngan song dag mthong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dis ma la ngag gi las rtsubs
po smras pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin pas mthong ba'i chos nyid la ngan song dag mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dge 'dun gyi gsar bu yin pas de gral rims kyi khri ldeg pa zhig thob pa dang / de zhig gis dogs pas bla 'og ma bsgyur bas nyal lo/ /des
bsams pa/ bdag nye dga' yin na khri la yang chags sam/ gal te mal cha'am/ khri ma rjes na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming yang mi 'dogs so snyam nas/ de nang par sngar langs te/
yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du song ba dang / des de la smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /ji ga
btsun pa nye dga' bde bar gzims sam/ des smras pa/ gsus po che khyod ji snyam du sems/ ji ltar bdag mal stan rim pa brgyad la nyal ba bzhin/ nye dga' yang de bzhin snyam
mam/ kho bo dge 'dun gyi gsar bu yin pas kho bo gral rims kyis khri ldeg pa zhig thob ste/ de zhig gis dogs nas kho bos bla 'og kyang mi bsgyur bar nyal lo/ /btsun pa nye
dga' mal stan rim pa brgyad po 'di 'dra ba brtags lags sam/ legs par brtags pa'o/ /shin tu brtags pa'o/ /gang du bkag /sus bkag /gal te brtags ba lags
na dbul gyis snoms la bzhud cig /nye dgas smras pa/ gsus po che ko sa la'i yul rnams kho bo dbang ngam ci/ gtsug lag khang du skyol la byin cig /des de la mi brgyad
byin te/ de la bzhis ni mal stan rnams khyer/ bzhis ni khri khyer nas de dag srang gi dbus nas dong ba bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dris pa/
shes ldan dag deng lha'i gzims mal gang du byed/ nye dgas smras pa/ nyid kyi pho brang du'o/ /gzims mal 'di gang du khyer/ nye dgas smras pa 'di dag ni bdag gis thob bo/ /
shes ldan dag dge sbyong nye dga' ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis dbyen spyo 'am ci/ zhes de dag smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do/ /de gtsug lag khang du song nas
gtsug lag khang du chag chag btab/ phyag dar byas nas/ ba'i lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs te/ gnas mal bshams nas nyal bar bsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
phyogs der byon to/ /de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag gis gnas mal ci 'dra bar mchis gzigs su gsol/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag thog ma nyid du rul ba sbed pa ni skyes bu gti mug nye dga' yin par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag khri stan mthon po dang / khri stan chen po la nyal ba yin no/ /de lta bas na dge slong gis khri stan mthon po dang / khri stan
chen po la 'dug par mi bya'o/ /'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri stan mthon po dang / khri stan chen po la 'dug par mi bya'o/ /zhes
gsungs pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/ de khri stan mthon po dag bshams par brtsams so/ /tshe
dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sngon rol nyid du son pa dang / des stan mthon po dag shom pa de mthong nas/ des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag stan 'di dag ni dge
slong dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis/ sdus shig /des de dag bsdu bar brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyang der gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen
bzhin du rmed pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ci zhig byed/ bcom ldan 'das/ khyim bdag 'dis chen
po la 'os pa'i gdan dag shom nas/ bdag gis khyim bdag stan 'di dag ni dge slong dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis 'di dag sdus shig ces bsgo ba dang / de de dag sdud pa lags
so| /kun dga' bo thams cad la 'byor pa yod pa ma yin gyis/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag stan shom pa la ma zlog cig /de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ khyim du khri stan mthon
po la 'dug par bya'i/ der nyal bar ni mi bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang du ni 'dug par mi bya nyal bar mi bya ste/ 'dug gam nyal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs nas
dge slong chos gos gsum pa gzhan zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du 'ongs pa dang / de'i bags pa'i gding ba bzang po da nye dgas mthong nas/
des de la smras pa bsod snyoms pa pags pa kho bo la byin cig /kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' 'gro yang rung mi 'gro yang rung /
bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'dir 'ongs so/ /bsod snyoms pa khyod ji snyam du sems/ nye dgas 'o ni 'dra ba'i pags pa rnyed par mi nus snyam/ nga'i rnyed pa
la ltos shig /btsun pa nye dga'/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis gang gi phyir nus pa de'i phyir kho bo mi 'bul lo/ /yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ba lang gi spyan
byed pa chen po zhes bya ba dang tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bshes pas/ de de'i gan du song ba na/ ji tsam na sos ka'i dus su be'u bkra zhing bkra ba dag byung ngo / /des be'u gcig gis rgyab
tu byugs pa dang / chen pos smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod be'u 'di'i ma'i 'o ma gsol bar bzhed dam ci/ des smras pa/ de yang 'dod mod kyi 'di 'dra ba'i pags pa dge slong gang
la yod pa ni sems las chung ngus bde bar dge ba'i phyogs la rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/ /chen pos smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' bka' stsal pas 'dzal gyis bzhud cig /de song
ba dang chen pos phyugs rdzi la bsgo ba/ be'u 'di sod la khyod kyis pags pa khyer te btsun pa nye dga' la phul cig /des be'u de bsad nas pags pa khyer te song ba dang / ba de be'u
la dungs pas skad 'byin cing rjes bzhin du song ba las/ de rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs pa dang / ba de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na skad 'byin cing 'dug
go |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo/
rgyal byed tshal gyi sgo na ba 'di ci'i phyir skad 'byin cing 'dug /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das btsun pa nye dgas be'u de'i pags pa 'tshal
ba'i slad du 'gum stsal bas/ des na ba de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na skad 'byin lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong
dag ko lpags 'chang ba yin gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis ko lpags bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ko
lpags bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/ khyim bdag des
gdan gzhan bsham du med nas/ des ko lpags kyi gdan dag bsham par brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba
dang / des khyim bdag de ko lpags kyi gdan dag shom pa mthong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag stan 'di dag ni dge slong dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis 'di dag sdus shig /des bsdu bar brtsam
brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyang der gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ci zhig byed/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ khyim bdag des gdan gzhan bsham du ma 'byor nas/ des ko lpags kyi
gdan bsham pa dang / bdag gis khyim bdag gdan 'di dag ni dge slong dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis/ 'di dag sdus shig ces bsgo nas/ de stan 'di dag sdud pa lags so/ /kun
dga' bo thams cad 'byor pa med pas/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag stan shom pa ma zlog cig /de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ khyim du ko lpags kyi stan bshams pa la 'dug par
bya'i/ nyal bar ni mi bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang du ni 'dug par mi bya/ nyal bar mi bya ste/ 'dug gam nyal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal
po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu rab tu byung tshun chad nas/ rtag tu nad bu can nyid du gyur to/ /gnyen dag de'i drung du song
ste son pa dang / des de dag la chos bshad do/ /de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu las chos mnyan nas/ bud med kyi gan du 'ongs te smras pa/ 'phags
pa pi lin da'i bus sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bur chos snyan dgu zhig bshad do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyed cag gis tshe dang ldan pa de las chos mnyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba
'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no/ /khyed cag kyang nyan 'dod cing / bdag cag der mchi bar ngo tsha'o/ /gal te 'phags pa bdag cag gi 'dir gshegs te chos bshad na/ bdag
cag gis kyang de bzhin du mnyan no/ /de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i thad du song la zhu bar bya'o zhes de dag tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang na ba der
song ste phyin nas/ smras pa/ 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu bud med dag chos thos par 'tshal lo/ /des smras pa/ kho bos bkag gam ci/ nyon cig /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags
pa bud med dag mchir ngo tsha lags so/ /gal te 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu de nyid du gshegs te/ chos bshad na de dag nyan par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho
bo na bas rkang pas ni 'gro mi nus so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhon pas gshegs/ bzhin bzang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /skabs de bcom
ldan 'das la/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu bzhon pa la zhon nas lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing dong ba drug sde rnams
kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'gro ba pha bi su zhig /de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po yin no/ /ci bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pa rjes su gnang ngam/ rjes su
gnang ngo / /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ni/ shAkya rnams shin tu bzhon pas rkang pas 'gro mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pa rjes su
gnang ngo snyam nas/ de rnams kyi gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel gyis khra bor byas shing pad+ma bzhin du byi dor byas pa'i bzhon pa dag nye bar bzhag ste/ de dag bzhon pa la zhon
nas srang gi dbus nas lag pa sgreng ste/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la nad med par gyur cig ces zer zhing dong ngo / /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci/ 'di dag bcom
ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ngam/ rjes su gnang ngo / /de dag gis 'phags pa dge sbyong khyod cag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis g.yen spyo ba yin no/ /zhes smras pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag bzhon pas 'gro ba yin te/ de lta
pas na dge slong gis bzhon pas 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba ni gnyis te/ rgas 'khogs
nas nyam chung pa dang / na ste sbyor mi bzod pa'o/ /dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las de dag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ chu rgal ba na dbus su phyin nas 'gro ma nus
pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis rkyal bslab par bya'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis rkyal bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis chu bo a ji ra pa ti la phar yang rkyal/ tshur yang rkyal pa dang / ji tsam na phyugs rdzi bud med dag
'ongs ba de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ sring mo tshur shog /khyed cag bdag cag gis bsgral lo/ /de dag gis de dag bsgral bar brtsams pa na/ de dag gis de dag gi yan lag dang
nying lag la reg cing de dag gis de dag bsgral nas smras pa/ sring mo dag yang tshur shog /kho bo cag gis phyir yang bsgral lo/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gi yan lag dang
nying lag dag la khyim thab kyis kyang ma reg na/ khyed cag gis reg par byas pas bdag cag slar ga la mchi zhes de dag smod par byed/ 'phya bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom
ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag bud med la reg par byed pa las yin gyi/ de lta
bas na/ dge slong gis bud med la reg par mi bya'o/ /reg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis bud med la reg par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / grong khyer gyi
mi rnams skyed mos tshal la dga' bas/ de rnams skyed mos tshal du dong ba dang / bud med cig chu len du song ba las de gred de chus khyer ro/ /de tshol du song ba'i mi des/ dge slong dag mthong nas
'phags pa dag gis bud med chus khyer ba zhig gzigs sam/ mthong ste chus khyer ba pha bi yin no/ /pha bi de da ltar shi la thug na nyin thog thag tu chu la lta zhing 'khod dam zhes pa'i skabs de/
bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag na re/ thongs shig ces zer na gal te mthu yod pa yin na
gtang bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag g.yo ba med par gyur te/ de dag bye ma spungs pa la khas bub tu bzhag nas bor te dong ba dang de was zos so/ /des bor te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /de dag chags pa
skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la gang dag kha ton zlos pa de dag ni kha ton byos shig /bsam gtan pa gang dag
yin pa de dag gis ni yid la byos shig /dro yol du dogs na de na ba lang rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi gang dag 'khod pa de dag la btad nas 'gro bar bya'o/ /drug sde dag gis khyim bdag gzhan
zhig gis ba'i mjug ma la bzung nas/ ba'i 'o ma zad zad du phar rkyal/ tshur rkyal to/ /des phyugs brdzi la dris pa/ de ring ci'i phyir 'o ma med/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa drug sde dag gis zhes
bya ba nas/ de smod par byed/ 'phya bar byed/ kha zer bar byed ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis ba'i mjug ma las bzung
ste rkyal bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ba'i mjug ma las bzung ste rkyal bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong chu rgal ba dag cig glang po che'i mjug ma nas
bzung ste/ 'gro bar 'dod pa dag phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mjug ma can lnga'i mjug ma las bzung ste 'gro bar bya ste/ glang po cang shes dang / rta cang
shes dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / g.yag gi'o/ /'on kyang rkyal pas rkyal bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rkyal bas rkyal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / drug sde dag gis
rgyal pa bud med dang skyes pa nyal po byed pa ri mor bris shing pad+ma ltar byi dor byas pa dag byas pa dang / de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ci lags
de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rkyal pa rjes su gnang ngo / /'phags pa dge sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis dbyen spyo ba'am ci/ zhes de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs
de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge sbyong gis rkyal ba bud med dang skyes pa nyal po byed pa ri mor bris shing /
pad+ma ltar byi dor byas pa dag bcang bar mi bya'o/ /'on kyang rkyal pa gnyis bcang bar bya ste/ rtsis bskus pa dang / rkyal skya'o/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'khor gyi khyams shig
brtsigs pa dang / chos nyan par dge slong shing gi mchil lham gyon pa dag lhags nas/ de dag gi shing gi mchil lham gyis sa gzhi bstar ba drud cing rlogs par gyur to/ khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyin nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa des mthong ngo / /mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ci/ 'dir mdang gsum rgyal po
gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang dgongs btab bam/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po ni ma yin mod kyi/ dge slong shing gi mchil lham gyon pa dag gcig 'ongs te de dag gis
'di ma rung bar byas so/ /de smod par byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag shing gi mchil lham 'chang ba yin gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis shing gi mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing
gi mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / khyim du dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de dag gis mchil lham 'dam gyis rlan par gyur pa'i skabs
de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim gyi nang du shing gi mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong
gi dge 'dun rnams la bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis shing gi mchil lham dag phul ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis ma blangs so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang
gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i tshe mu stegs can rnams sbyin gnas su gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ blangs
nas dge 'dun gyi snam phyis sam/ chab khung sar gzhag par bya'o// sarba mang+ga laM//
